contentrichtext.text: {{tocright}} This is a list of [[List of U.S. state prisons|state prisons]] used by the state of [[Hawaii]]. It does '''not''' include [[List of U.S. federal prisons|federal prisons]] located in the state of Hawaii. ==Hawaii State prisons== * [http://hawaii.gov/psd/corrections/prisons/halawa-correctional-facility Halawa Correctional Facility] - [[Aiea, Hawaii|Aiea]] * [http://hawaii.gov/psd/corrections/prisons/kulani-correctional-facility Kulani Correctional Facility] - [[Hilo, Hawaii|Hilo]] * [http://hawaii.gov/psd/corrections/prisons/waiawa-correctional-center Waiawa Correctional Facility] - [[Waipahu, Hawaii|Waipahu]] * [http://hawaii.gov/psd/corrections/prisons/womens-community-correctional-center Women's Community Correctional Center] - [[Kailua, Honolulu County, Hawaii|Kailua]] ==Hawaii Department of Public Safety jails== The [[Hawaii Department of Public Safety]] also operates the [[jail]]s in the state. There are no [[county (US)|county]] jails in Hawaii. * [http://hawaii.gov/psd/corrections/jails/hawaii-community-correctional-center Hawaii Community Correctional Center] - [[Hilo, Hawaii|Hilo]] * [http://hawaii.gov/psd/corrections/jails/kauai-community-correctional-center Kauai Community Correctional Center] - [[Lihue, Hawaii|Lihue]] * [http://hawaii.gov/psd/corrections/jails/maui-community-correctional-center Maui Community Correctional Center] - [[Wailuku, Hawaii|Wailuku]] * [http://hawaii.gov/psd/corrections/jails/oahu-community-correctional-center Oahu Community Correctional Center] - [[Honolulu, Hawaii|Honolulu]] ==Mainland facilities== Several correctional facilities on the continental United States' mainland are contracted to house Hawaii's prisoners: * [http://hawaii.gov/psd/corrections/prisons/otter-creek/otter-creek Otter Creek Correctional Center] - [[Wheelwright, Kentucky]] * Red Rock Correctional Center - [[Eloy, Arizona]] * [[Saguaro Correctional Center]] - [[Eloy, Arizona]] ==External links== *{{Official|http://hawaii.gov/psd}} {{Prisons and Correctional facilities in Oceania}} [[Category:Hawaii-related lists|Prisons]] [[Category:Prisons in Hawaii]] [[Category:Lists of United States state prisons|Hawaii]]
